imgDesc.text: When creatures are affected by <color=#ffe14b>Electro</color> and <color=#ffe14b>Dendro</color> , Quicken will occur, which will render them Quickened.

When <color=#ffe14b>Quickened</color> creatures are affected by <color=#ffe14b>Electro</color> or <color=#ffe14b>Dendro</color> attacks, the Aggravate or Spread reactions will occur respectively, causing them to take additional DMG.
